title: Grayscale GBTC’s outflows linked to Genesis’ bankruptcy proceedings: Arkham Intelligence

title: India’s Digital Rupee Expands: Non-Banks to Offer Central Bank Digital Currency Wallets
description: India’s central bank has announced that it will enable non-bank payment system operators to offer central bank digital currency (CBDC) wallets.
